chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent:
|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| ![postgresql](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wavefront-img/postgresql-logo.png) | Real-time **PostgreSQL** status. These statistics are collected via Telegraf from the PostgreSQL `pg_stat_database` and `pg_stat_bgwriter` views. Detailed description of each metric can be found in the  [PostgreSQL  documentation](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.2/static/monitoring-stats.html#PG-STAT-DATABASE-VIEW). The only object covered in this dashboard is Database.
| | |

**Note:** *This dashboard is provided by Wavefront. It's not directly editable, which lets us deploy new versions without affecting any of your customizations. If you want to make your own version, click ![pencil](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wavefront-img/pen-icon.png) **> Clone** and give the dashboard a new URL*.
